Career Objective:

Work Experience:
1.Working as a Counselor in HCS career development Academy-

Roles & Responsibility:
Career counselors  may seek out potential clients by giving 
presentations on their services. 
They examine client records, conduct interviews and 
administer aptitude and achievement tests to gather 
information that assists them in helping clients choose

Designed computer graphics for courses in coordination with

2.Worked as a Faculty & Admin Counselor  in We Shine Academy .

Coordinated with various companies and performed research for
graphics.

3.Worked as a Teacher in Sri. P. Muthaiyar Hr. Sec. School , Panruti

Roles & Responsibility:
Introduced students to computer software and hardware

Operated and maintained computer hardware and purchased 
new softwareTaught five courses per semester and assigned passing students
actual IT projects
Prepared courses for each semester and ensured students 
scored higher grades in tests.
4.Worked as a Lecturer in Anna Velankanni Polytechnic College ,

Roles & Responsibility:

demonstrating each logical steps in computer programming

Making use of Video Conferencing System and providing 
instructions to overseas students
